    • getCollidingGrass

      public Tile getCollidingGrass()
      Finds and returns the grass tile that the player is currently colliding with. If the player is not colliding with any grass tile, null is returned.
      Returns:
      the grass tile that the player is colliding with, or null if there is no collision.
